medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain for the last few days and one episode of large-volume emesis this morning.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient reports a mild to moderate amount of right lower quadrant abdominal discomfort that radiates into his back for the last few days, associated with weakness and lethargy. Wife notes low blood pressure at home; BP medications were held. He felt nauseous after breakfast and had one non-bilious non-bloody emesis this morning.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Stage 4 CKD, IDDM, HTN, HPL, CAD status post 3 vessel CABG and VF arrest status post ICD, PVD, anemia of chronic disease, remote CVA, carotid stenosis, GERD, remote esophagus, history of bleeding ulcer, chronic bilateral diabetic foot ulcers with osteomyelitis, cataracts.
medical_history.family_history: Father died in his 60s from unknown causes. Oldest brother died from stomach aneurysm. Mother died at an unclear age. Three siblings had diabetes.
